|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [PaletteType](./fast-components.palettetype.md) | The named palettes of the MSFT design system |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createColorPalette(baseColor)](./fast-components.createcolorpalette.md) |  |
|  [isDarkMode(designSystem)](./fast-components.isdarkmode.md) | Determines if the design-system should be considered in "dark mode". We're in dark mode if we have more contrast between \#000000 and our background color than \#FFFFFF and our background color. That threshold can be expressed as a relative luminance using the contrast formula as (1 + 0.5) / (bg + 0.05) === (bg + 0.05) / (0 + 0.05), which reduces to the following, where bg is the relative luminance of the background color |
|  [neutralFillCard(designSystem)](./fast-components.neutralfillcard.md) |  |
|  [neutralFillCard(backgroundResolver)](./fast-components.neutralfillcard_1.md) |  |
|  [neutralFocusInnerAccent(accentFillColor)](./fast-components.neutralfocusinneraccent.md) |  |
|  [palette(paletteType)](./fast-components.palette.md) | Retrieves a palette by name. This function returns a function that accepts a design system, returning a palette a palette or null |
